name: Karl BOOM
description:
Place bombs and hide in this Bomberman-style action game. Trap other players and hit them with a BOOM.
Last one standing wins!

Be prepared to face the Puncher who will (guess what) punch you to keep you from hiding.
Go with or against the flow and face tilted explosions.

Features:
  • Online multiplayer for up to 6 players.
  • Local multiplayer (shared screen) for up to 4 players (requires controllers).
  • Combined local/online multiplayer games.
  • Coop survival mode for 1-2 players.
  • 6 unique maps.
  • Insane AI mode.
  • Supports Steam Leaderboards and Steam invites.
